social_issues: Labor disputes or shortages impacting service quality and operational efficiency
governance_issues: Need for continuous innovation and service improvement to maintain competitive edge

sources.title: Old Dominion Freight Line - Wikipedia
sources.snippet: Old Dominion Freight Line, Inc. (ODFL) is an American regional, inter-regional and national less than truckload shipping (LTL) company. In addition to its core LTL services, the company offers expedited, logistics and household moving services. [4] [5]The company has five primary product groups: Domestic, Expedited, People, Global, Household Services and Technology.
